S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-5614: NullPointerException with INSERT INTO [global temporary table] SELECT ... FROM [VTI]
Disables bulk-insert for GTTs when selecting from a VTI. Added a new test case. Added SampleVTI, which is an incomplete (only supports a few getters) VTI intended for basic testing.
Patch file: derby-5614-1b-disable_bulkinsert_gtt.diff
